items.title: Cape Verde declares state of emergency after deadly floods
items.description: The situation is being described as "catastrophic" after islands hit by vast amounts of rain.

items.title: Three Colombian soldiers killed in drone attack
items.description: Drones are being increasingly used by illegal armed groups to attack Colombia's security forces.

items.title: Gaza talks to focus on releasing hostages all in one go, Netanyahu hints
items.description: Mediators say a deal can be pushed through in the weeks before Israel's planned expansion of the war.

items.title: Evacuations in Alaska after glacial melt raises fears of record flooding
items.description: Meltwater is escaping from a basin that is dammed by a glacier - prompting fears of a deluge in state capital Juneau.

items.title: National Guard troops appear in Washington DC as mayor rejects Trump's 'authoritarian push'
items.description: Armoured vehicles were spotted at urban centres and tourist sites around the US capital on Tuesday evening.
